thread.title: Aaron Kennon on why investors are sanguine on inflation

title: Aaron Kennon on why investors are sanguine on inflation
text:
Aaron Kennon on why investors are sanguine on inflation 8:19pm GMT - 05:16 
Clear Harbor Asset Management's CEO also tells Reuters' Fred Katayama why he likes the prospects for chip and natural gas stocks. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
